about.title: ABOUT ME
about.content:
HIRICH Oussama, a 3rd-year student in the Web Engineering Bachelor program at ESGI Paris, aiming for a career as a software developer. Passionate about web and software application development, I have gained solid experience in Next.js, JavaScript, PHP, Python, and SQL, which I apply through my academic and personal projects.
Currently seeking a work-study program (1 week school / 3 weeks company) to strengthen my skills and contribute to ambitious projects.

items.description:
• Work-study at Prime Environnement (industrial company).
• Development and maintenance of websites (ReactJS, TailwindCSS, JavaScript, PHP) and creation of landing pages.

• Work-study at ABS Security (industrial company).
• Development of websites (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP) and CMS integration (WordPress).
• Design and creation of marketing materials for social media to increase visibility and client acquisition.

• Programming: HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, PHP8 (and MVC-type architectures), JavaScript.
• Database design and management (SQL / relational databases).
• Linux and system environment management.
• Git / version control.

items.type: Program suspended due to lack of work-study contract
items.description:
• Programming: HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, PHP8 (and MVC-type architectures), JavaScript.
• Database design and management (SQL / relational databases).
• Linux and system environment management.
• Git / version control.

• Programming: Java, Python, PHP, C, C#, JavaScript, React.js, Node.js.
• Database design and management (SQL, MySQL) / Analysis and design (UML / Merise).
Life and Earth Sciences, with honors.

items.type: Design and development of web solutions for international clients (landing pages, mini-applications).
items.description:
• Design and development of a web application and a landing page with Next.js for BFM Énergies.
• Design and implementation of landing pages for Mira Ecologia using WordPress and Elementor.

• Restaurant website: Full development with HTML, CSS, native PHP, and JavaScript (BTS final project).
• Online dictionary: Application in HTML, CSS, JavaScript connected to an external API…
